title: First Android 13 beta now available for the Lenovo Tab P12 Pro
content:
The Lenovo Tab P12 Pro is the first tablet to get an official Android 13 beta from Google, which is the same tablet that developers were encouraged to use to test out the Android 12L beta. Developers can now install the beta on their tablet, though there is a pretty lengthy list of features that

The post First Android 13 beta now available for the Lenovo Tab P12 Pro appeared first on XDA.
description: The first Android 13 Beta is now available for the Lenovo P12 Pro, and you can test it out today on your device. Check it out here!
